thread.title: Sage Ridge, Sierra Lutheran to remain in Div. IV
thread.title_full: Sage Ridge, Sierra Lutheran to remain in Div. IV

title: Sage Ridge, Sierra Lutheran to remain in Div. IV
text:
Sage Ridge, Sierra Lutheran to remain in Div. IV Jim Krajewski , jkrajewski@rgj.com 1:57 p.m. PDT October 2, 2015 NIAA logo CONNECT 3 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Both Sage Ridge and Sierra Lutheran schools will be allowed to remain in Division IV in athletics after a vote at the Nevada Interscholastic Activities Association Board of Control meeting on Thursday. 
Both schools are already in Division IV, but had been slated to move to Division III next fall. 
Also Thursday, the Board upheld the position statement that drones are not to be flown over athletic events. At its next meeting in January, the Board will make it a policy. 
No action was taken on the soccer mercy rule proposal. 
The soccer realignment proposal will be discussed again in January. Read or Share this story: http://on.rgj.com/1Rl4I4U TOP VIDEOS
